text: Bro, you're an incredible human being. I'm so proud of you but I'm sorry about all the shit you faced in th aftermath. You're amazing and I'm in awe of you!
author: MaryamBibiDin

text:
***Calling all friends and allies***

Please try and attend this vigil to pray and grieve for the Muslim lives lost in Christchurch, New Zealand.  

It's happening next Tuesday (19th) at 5:30pm at the Brian Clough Statue, Nottingham. 

https://www.facebook.com/events/2200493083534324/?ti=as …
author: MaryamBibiDin
